titles.title: Strengthen Thyselves o Daughters of Zion

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Strengthen thyselves, O daughters of Zion,
Put on thy zeal as a garment.
Strengthen thyselves, O sons of the Most High,
Put on thy zeal as a mantle.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Strengthen thyselves in thy God,
Lift up the hands that are weak,
Strengthen thyselves,
Oh strengthen thyselves in thy God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Wait on the Lord, and be of good courage,
And He shall strengthen your heart.
Be of good courage, all that hope in the Lord,
And He shall strengthen your heart.
